name: sp0rm
description:
How To Play:

FunctionPlayer 1Player 2
Wiggle the first segment of the flagelo
QUWiggle the second segment of the flageloWIWiggle the third segment of the flageloEOWiggle the fourth segment of the flageloRP

The bigger the segment, the more the wiggle adds to velocity, and the more its direction influences the angular moment. Try different techniques to advance and rotate as fast as you can!
